preview.html: Whoever sees the sea while it is rough, this vision may differ in terms of the state of the dreamer and the state of the sea in the dream, and if you want clarification, follow the rest of the article from our interpreter. com.Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single girl. When opinions differ about seeing the sea in a dream for a single girl, we have come up with the most reliable interpretations. What if an unmarried girl sees the sea raging and expresses her fear in her dream. The vision indicates that there are a lot of overflowing feelings that seek To her towards a specific person. But if he saw that he was swimming in the sea and almost drowned in the dream, then I have the only girl. The vision showed that there is a small obstacle in her life, but she will soon get rid of it, thanks to God Almighty. As for seeing the calm sea in a dream of a single girl. It has meanings of goodness and happiness. Which you will feel with a strong vision, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees that she is drowning in sea water, and someone comes to save her in the dream. It could mean that she has a lot of problems and that someone is helping her and cooperating with her in her affairs and in all her problems. While she saw herself She swims brilliantly in the raging sea in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is an indication of the strength and solidity of the character that can face many of the problems present in the life of the dreamer. See also: Rising sea level in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is looking To the sea and she was sad in the dream. The vision indicated her fear of the future or her fear of what seemed unknown to her, and God Almighty knows best. While in a dream she saw a married woman swimming in the sea without fear or hesitation. The vision showed the strength of her personality in challenging obstacles and facing problems, especially if The sea was rough. As for seeing her drowning in the sea and trying to save her situation in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman saw that she was swimming in the sea, then a violent storm came to the sea and she almost drowned in the dream. The vision may indicate that she will face some difficulties related to her life’s path. But we will get rid of it. From them quickly, by the command of God Almighty. Seeing swimming in a calm sea in a married woman’s dream. This means that she feels sincere feelings towards her husband in some of their affairs. It is said about seeing a raging sea and crashing waves in a married woman’s dream. This is evidence of the presence of some marriage problems that the owner is going through. The vision in this period, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man and its meaning. While when a married man sees the sea, there may be many differences from it, and from any other situation. Seeing a raging sea with crashing waves in a married man’s dream. This means that he is exposed to some problems. Or crises in his private life, and God Almighty knows best. While he sees the calm sea that a married man is looking at in a dream. Elements of stability in this person’s life, from private matters and the like. A case if a married man dreams that he is swimming skillfully in a raging sea. The vision showed firmness and strength. The personality possessed by the dreamer. Seeing yourself swimming with many people in a married man’s dream can be interpreted as satisfaction

title: Interpretation of broken bones in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about breaking bones in a dream for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman for a divorced woman, if she broke human bones, an animal bone, and ate the bones of Nabulsi and Imam al-Sadiq and others. One of the most preoccupying dreams for some, this dream is considered one of the incomprehensible dreams, as there is some fear in it, so many people want to know its interpretation, as it is a dream of difficult events and raises their doubts. Whoever dreams as some see it as indicating unpleasant things or unpleasant events. Required, and therefore the interpretation of the dream must be ensured so that everyone is fully aware of the correct interpretation, as there are those who interpret dreams incorrectly in ways that cause some anxiety for many, so the dream must be interpreted through reliable sources. Interpretation of a dream about breaking bones When you dream of breaking bones, this indicates money and prestige for a man, but bones in a dream mean losing money and exposing a man's house to severe sadness. Interpretation of dreams of breaking bones in a dream, the appearance of bones in a dream differs from their interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about bones The dream of bones has an interpretation for Christians, as it indicates the deterioration and deterioration of the social situation, as bones are elements of bankruptcy, disappearance of money and exposure to a severe financial crisis, and it is also evidence of a person being exposed to a catastrophic risk. Financial risks to material life, as he is exposed to a large debt and the inability to pay it, and the dream of bones and crushing them exceeds the increase in worries and a difficult life, and these dangers are exposed to the dreamer. From this dream and he was not engaged in prayer and away from God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about animal bones The dream of bones has an interpretation according to its type. Seeing the bones of animals such as cows and rams has a better interpretation than other bones, as seeing these bones indicates the presence of a new life nearby. As for burning bones in a dream, this means that you earn a lot of money through trade. Seeing cow bones is good news and indicates the purchase of a property or land. Interpretation of a dream about bones for a single woman An unmarried woman who sees bones in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to many worries and problems in her life. Interpretation of a dream about bones for a married woman As for a married woman, it indicates the presence of problems in married life and separation from her husband

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about donating blood according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about donating bloodDreams are reflections of real life, but in a parallel world inside us, so everything in dreams is a message to a person, either to indicate current events or indications of how the situation should be later, and in this article we will learn more about all the interpretations related to a dream Donating blood. Interpretation of a dream about donating blood by Ibn Sirinama. Interpretation of a dream about donating blood? Donating blood in a dream is considered one of the signs that indicate self-sacrifice for the sake of others or trying to do something that benefits those around you. In the event that a person sees that he is donating blood in a dream and is captivated by what He sees it, the interpretation of the dream in this case is evidence that the viewer is characterized by kindness and his preference for his concern for the group over personal concerns. If the dreamer is a father and has children, then the interpretation of the dream for him indicates the sacrifices that this man makes so that the children are in the best possible condition. Also to the dream of donating blood as evidence of wealth and ease of material circumstances for the pioneer and indicates the alms that the person gives to others. Interpretation of the dream of donating blood by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin sees that donating blood in a dream is a good that the dreamer offers to others in a good spirit, and is not followed by boasting on his part, as it is evidence On one's good qualities. When a rich man dreams that he is donating blood and giving it to someone who needs it, the dream expresses the charity and money that this person gives to please God. In the opposite case, that the person in the dream needs someone to give him blood as a result of his health crisis, then the dream in this The condition has strong indicators that indicate a state of financial need and financial difficulties for that person. Who needs the help of those around him. Likewise, the interpretation of donating blood in a dream can be interpreted as a dreamer who is a person who reaches his womb, because it is evidence of the strong bond that connects him with his relatives and family. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. Interpretation website Egyptian Dreams on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about donating blood for a single woman Donating blood in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the indicators of this girl’s love for kindness and extending a helping hand to those in need. If the unmarried girl who saw the dream of donating blood gets engaged and sees that she is supplying her fiancé with blood and is happy With this act, the interpretation of the dream for her indicates the strong bonds of love that unite them. In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself donating blood in a dream repeatedly and without compensation every time, this is an expression of the situation she is experiencing by constantly giving it without praise for what she does. Others. Dream interpretation for a single girl, if she sees that a stranger is donating her blood in the vision, it could express her need for kindness and tenderness around her, which she does not often find, so she is looking for it. To people who are strangers to her. Interpretation of a dream about donating blood for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is donating blood, the interpretation of the dream for her generally indicates

title: Interpretation of a bag in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In this article, learn in detail about the interpretation of a bag in a dream for a single woman. The bag is one of the things that a woman needs when she travels abroad and keeps all her personal tools in it except money and cards, but it is also one of the mysterious dreams that some dreamers have. They are simple dreams and do not necessarily express any specific meaning for them, but there are many interpretations mentioned by dream interpreters regarding this vision, which I will highlight in the case of a single girl, through an encyclopedia.Interpretation of a bag in a dream for a single womanIf a single girl sees that she is carrying A bag with many papers in her hands, then this vision symbolizes her ambitious personality that seeks to achieve success and excellence at the academic level. If the bag contains cosmetics, then this dream lies in the interpretation of the dreamer’s attempt to harm someone around her by deceiving him. If a woman sees someone who is not... Married in a dream: A worn-out bag, then this vision indicates marriage to a man who does not suit her age, but if she is modern and shiny, then this dream means her marriage to a man who has great importance in reality. Seeing a blue bag in a dream indicates that it is one of the good visions that indicate Goodness, livelihood, and happiness for the dreamer. Seeing a large bag in a dream is a sign of piety, uprightness, and commitment to obey God. If the bag is open in a dream, then this dream indicates kindness and livelihood represented by earning a lot of money in reality. Interpretation of a dream about buying a black bag for single women. Interpreters showed Dreams that buying a black bag in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate that things will change for the better. But if the dreamer sees that she is carrying a black bag in a dream, then this vision is not promising for her and indicates her separation from her life partner. These were the most common interpretations Clarity of the bag in a dream for a single woman. At the end of this article, it should be noted that all of these mentioned interpretations are only interpretations of dream interpreters, as no one can be sure of their fulfillment because only God knows the unseen. To interpret another dream, you can download the instant Dream Interpretation application from the Encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man chasing me for a married woman

preview.html: If the man who is chasing her in the dream attacks her, it interprets that she will experience something bad in her life, and God knows best, and through our interpreter’s website, we will provide you in detail with seeing a dream about a man chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a man chasing me in a dream for a single girlIf a single girl dreams A married woman has a man chasing her in the street while she is crying. It appears that she will feel disappointed in her life and it will make her very sad. If an unmarried girl looks at the man who is chasing her in the dream and is afraid of him. It indicates the presence of an evil person in her life who is trying to harm her psychologically and physically, and God knows best. And seeing A single girl saw in a dream that a man was chasing her in the dream while she was looking at him. A sign of something wrong in her life that she will regret later and must be very careful about. An unmarried woman who saw that her fiancé was chasing her in a dream while she was far from him. A sign that her fiancé He drags her feet over the bad things in her life and she must pay attention to that. It indicates that there are some crises in her life and that she She will be sad for this period of time. If a married woman sees a man in a dream, chasing her in the dream while she is crying. It indicates that something very disturbing will happen to her and will make her cry a lot at this time in her life. And if a married woman looks at the man who is chasing her in the dream and turns away from him. This indicates However, she is trying to get rid of what is harmful to her and she will succeed in this matter. A married woman sees in a dream that a man was chasing her, and she knows him well in the dream. Here it explains something wrong, which this married woman will end up doing in her life. Interpretation of seeing a man chasing me in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams That a man was chasing her in a dream and she was afraid. It shows that she will get into a big problem in her life, and she will not end it in a short time. A divorced woman who dreams that the man who is chasing her was her ex-husband in the dream. It explains that she will go through a time full of crises in her life during this time, and God knows best. In her life and it will make her very sad. Interpretation of seeing a man chasing me in a dream about the man and its meaning. title: Interpretation of the moon falling in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the moon in a dream Many followers of our site wonder about the interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream in detail. Therefore, we decided to deal with all the implications of this vision, which in most cases are praiseworthy interpretations, but we cannot judge absolutely because the interpretation of any vision is known to vary and change according to the details that occurred in and according to the person’s condition, whether male or female, married or pregnant. Follow us. Interpretation of the moon falling in a dream in detail. Whoever sees the moon in his dreams, indicates a righteous or righteous son, or a righteous husband. To see the moon in a dream, symbolizes a teacher or leader. Seeing the moon in a person's dream can be a sign of an increase in money. Seeing someone holding the moon in his hands in a dream may symbolize an urgent marriage, God willing. A patient who sees the moon in his dreams is good news for recovery and the end of the illness journey. Seeing the disappearance or absence of the moon in a dream symbolizes the death of grace at the hands of the seer. Seeing the full moon, that is, the full moon in the sky, can be a sign of the presence of an influential and positioned person. A person's vision of the moon running in the sky and flying between the planets and stars symbolizes the seer's journey or his transition to another life such as marriage, God willing. A person who sees the full moon in a dream symbolizes the face of the seer. Seeing a person hanging on the moon in his dream symbolizes the arrival of abundant goodness and a lot of money. A man who sees the moon turning into the sun in his dreams is a sign of goodness for this man from his wife. A married woman who sees the moon shining in a dream indicates that the husband is financially capable. A married woman's vision of the dim moon may symbolize Sadness, poverty and crises in her life. Interpretation of seeing the crescent moon in a dream Seeing the crescent moon in a dream symbolizes influence and leadership. Seeing the crescent moon in a dream accompanied by a new haircut or clothes symbolizes the dreamer performing Hajj or Umrah, God willing. A married woman who sees the crescent moon in her dreams foretells the return of the traveler or absence. Seeing the crescent moon in the holy months may be good news for the Hajj fortune teller. Seeing the crescent moon in the form of a snake or a serpent in a dream can alert the dreamer of the coming of a calamity, God forbid. Seeing the green crescent moon in a dream symbolizes commitment and marriage to a trustworthy and righteous person. Seeing the crescent moon moving in a dream means that the dreamer is waiting for something to happen, but it will not happen. Whoever sees more than one crescent moon in a dream, good news for Hajj. Seeing the red crescent moon in a dream is a sign of affection and love from the dreamer to his wife. Interpretation of a lunar eclipse in a dream Seeing a lunar eclipse in one's dream, that is, the moon's disk that blocks the sun during the day, indicates the arrival of good news or a happy meeting. A person who sees a lunar eclipse in his sleep can be a sign of illness and anxiety. A person who sees the sky without moons or stars at night in his dream It symbolizes the dreamer's distraction and confusion. Seeing a clear, moonless sky in a dream may indicate obstacles in life and emotional or professional shocks that the dreamer is exposed to. Interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream in detail for a single woman, an unmarried girl

Therefore, we decided to deal with all the repercussions of this vision, which in most cases are considered praiseworthy interpretations, but we cannot judge absolutely because the interpretation of any vision is known to vary and change according to the details that occurred in and according to the person’s condition, whether he is male, female, married, or pregnant. Follow us.Interpretation of projecting the moon in a dream in detail. Whoever sees the moon in his dreams, denotes a good or righteous son, or a good husband. To see the moon in a dream, symbolizes a teacher or leader. Seeing the moon in a person’s dream can be a sign of an increase in money. A person holding the moon in his hands in a dream may symbolize an urgent marriage, God willing. A sick person who sees the moon in his dreams is good news for recovery and the end of the illness journey. Seeing the disappearance or absence of the moon in a dream symbolizes the death of grace at the hands of the dreamer. Seeing the full moon can be That is, the full moon in the sky, is a sign of the presence of an influential and positioned person. A person’s vision of the moon running in the sky and flying between the planets and stars symbolizes the dreamer’s journey or his transition to another life, such as marriage, God willing. A person who sees the full moon in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s face. A vision A person hanging on the moon in his dream, symbolizes the arrival of abundant goodness and a lot of money. A man who sees the moon turning into the sun in his dreams is a good sign for this man from his wife. A married woman who sees the moon shining in a dream indicates that the husband is financially capable. It may symbolize A married woman seeing the dim moon indicates sadness, poverty, and crises in her life. Interpretation of seeing the crescent moon in a dream. Seeing the crescent moon in a dream symbolizes influence and leadership. Seeing the crescent moon in a dream and accompanying it with a haircut or new clothes symbolizes the dreamer performing Hajj or Umrah, God willing. The married woman who sees The crescent moon in her dreams foretells the traveler’s return or absence. Seeing the crescent moon in the holy months may be good news for the Hajj fortune teller. Seeing the crescent moon in the form of a serpent or serpent in a dream can alert the dreamer of the coming of a calamity, God forbid. Seeing the green crescent moon in a dream symbolizes Commitment and marriage to an honest and righteous person. Seeing the crescent moon moving in a dream means that the dreamer is waiting for something to happen, but it will not happen. Whoever sees more than one crescent moon in a dream, good news for Hajj. Seeing the red crescent moon in a dream is a sign of affection and love from the dreamer to his wife. Interpretation Lunar eclipse in a dreamSeeing a lunar eclipse in one's dream, i.e. the disk of the moon blocking the sun during the day, indicates the arrival of good news or a happy meeting. A person who sees a lunar eclipse during his sleep can be a sign of illness and anxiety. A person who sees a sky without moons or Stars at night in his dream, symbolizing the dreamer’s dispersion and confusion. Seeing a clear, moonless sky in a dream may indicate obstacles in life and emotional or professional shocks to which the dreamer is exposed. Interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream in detail for a single woman, an unmarried girl

preview.html: In addition, we also place it according to the situation of the viewer, whether he is male or single, pregnant or other, so follow the lines below from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing a banana in a dream for a single girl: Seeing this dream is a sign of joy and happiness close to her heart. The girl who dreams of eating Bananas in a dream are a sign that good things will come to her. This dream is also a sign that she will marry someone she loves, and she will get help and a good man. If an unmarried woman sees a banana, but it is still green, and eats it, this is a sign of a new relationship that will start In her life. Seeing bananas for an unmarried girl, if she is selling them in a dream, is a sign of the approaching date of her engagement. Also, an unmarried woman who offers bananas to one of her guests in her house is evidence of an upcoming marriage. A girl who eats fresh yellow bananas shows that she has a good reputation. And good morals. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying yellow bananas for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a banana in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees bananas in her dream is a sign of the prosperity and joy that she is currently experiencing. A woman who sees herself planting a banana in the ground is considered a good sign of pregnancy and that she will give birth to a boy. Good. A married woman who sees a long or large banana is a symbol of her husband occupying a high position at work. A married woman picks bananas from a tree in a dream that she enjoys, and many benefits come to her after she gets tired. Bananas in a married woman’s dream, and she eats them in a dream, but she Rotten, a sign of a problem between her and her husband. Eating a rotten banana in a dream for a married woman is a sign of her husband’s infidelity. A woman who dreams that she is peeling a banana suggests that she and the people in her house will be relieved of stress and anxiety. A wife who sees that she is eating more than one banana shows She is in good health and in good health. Interpretation of seeing a banana in a dream for a man and its meaning. A wrapped banana or one in a wrapper seen in a man’s dream indicates that he is a fetus inside his wife’s placenta. A banana in a dream indicates the presence of a person in a grave or prison, referring to many indications that he is Alive. A dream about a banana is evidence of a lot of knowledge that the dreamer has accumulated in the books he reads. A dream about eating a banana and eating it in a man’s dream indicates that he will get more money from the cooperation of a strange man. Eating a banana in a dream is a great good if the dreamer is sick, God will soon remove his pain and fatigue. If the color of the banana is green, which is what a person sees that he is eating, then this is good news that it will come to him soon. A dream about a banana for someone close to God shows his worship and closeness to the Lord of Glory. This dream also indicates an increase in money and abundant profits. Read Also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing bananas for single women. The meaning of seeing a banana in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman who sees bananas in her dream indicates that she will give birth to a child (a male). If a pregnant woman sees a banana tree, this means that she will give birth to a female. A pregnant woman distributes bananas in a dream. This means that A sign of approaching

title: A gift of shoes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: It also indicates goodness and abundance of livelihood for pregnant and married women, and interpretations vary depending on the colors of the shoe and the materials it is made of. We will explain more interpretations from the Mufsir.com website, so stay tuned. Interpretation of seeing a gift of shoes in a dream for one girl: If the girl sees that she is getting a gift from someone, which is natural leather shoes. The vision expresses the extent of the connection between the dreamer and the one who gives her the shoes in the dream. Either If a girl sees someone in her dream, someone gives her shoes studded with diamonds. The vision indicates her close marriage to a rich man who has a high status in society. What if she sees that her lover or fiancé gives her golden shoes. The vision shows that she will marry this young man and her life will be full With happiness and love, and God knows best. And if an unmarried woman sees her brother in a dream, he bought her a pair of shoes. The dream shows the strength of the relationship between her and her brother and his help in life. If a girl in a dream is wearing shoes and she feels that the shoes are comfortable and neither narrow nor wide. The vision indicates To transform the visionary’s life for the better, expand her scope of living, and feel happiness, psychological comfort and inner peace. When a single woman sees in her dream a man giving her a pair of shoes in different colors. The vision indicates her relationship or marriage with someone completely different from her socially or culturally. This does not mean that The difference is good. If a single girl sees someone giving her high heels. The vision indicates her marriage to a person who enjoys respect and high status among people. The more high-heeled shoes, the higher the person’s status. See also: Interpretation of a dream about broken shoes by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a gift of shoes in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees someone giving her shoes, then this person is also her husband. The vision is considered good news and indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. But if a married woman sees someone giving her white shoes. The vision shows the extent of love and understanding between her and her husband. Either You see a gift of black shoes versus seeing white shoes. The vision indicates the suffering of the dreamer in her married life and with her children. Also, losing a gift of shoes in a dream for a married woman indicates the disputes that will arise between her and her husband, which may lead to divorce, and God knows best. Seeing a gift from Plastic shoes in a married woman’s dream. Indicates her adaptation in life, accepting difficult situations in her life, and dealing with problems and difficulties in an intelligent and cunning way. If the shoe is made of copper, the vision indicates the dreamer’s good reputation. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband gives her shoes Made from animal skin, the vision shows the extent of his love for her. Either if a married woman sees her husband giving her high-heeled shoes. The dream indicates the dreamer’s love for her husband because of the happiness and sacrifices he offers her. The husband giving his wife iron women’s dream shoes. The vision indicates the stubbornness of the dreamer In various aspects of life. This leads to disputes and disagreements that may lead to...

title: Interpretation of seeing a house collapsing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a house collapsing in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The house is the last reference for all people after a long journey that they live throughout the day, and it is the place where they feel safe and stable, and in general a person cannot live normally without feeling stable and safe somewhere, so seeing The demolition or collapse of the house is a disturbing and frightening dream that portends loss. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a house collapsing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a house collapsing. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees in a dream that he has entered a new house with complete facilities and in its best condition, this indicates that if he is poor, God will enrich him and give him Money. It is like the beauty of the house that he saw in a dream. If he does not know the owner of the house, then this indicates that he will become the owner of the house. If he dreams that the house is made of clay, then this indicates an abundance of legitimate food, and if the house is covered with plaster, then this indicates forbidden. Money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is building a house other than his own in a known or unknown place, let him know its condition. If this is a place he knows, then it is food, and he is knowledgeable and seeking. If the building is made of clay, then this is evidence of maintenance. If they show hatred, then he will regret them in some way. After that, their destruction in a dream indicates repentance from them. The unknown and unknown place is the last house because God Almighty called it a house, and God Almighty said (and this is the house of the future). And whoever dreams that he is sick in his house, this indicates his recovery and God has protected him from the adversities and tribulations of this world. If not If the dreamer is sick, this is evidence of his great benefit to him or that he is going for Hajj. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a house collapsing in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is entering his neighbor’s house, this indicates his interference in his secret, even if he is an immoral person who is betraying him in his livelihood. And whoever sees in his dream that his house Far from it, this is evidence of his disobedience to God and he must repent and return to God. Whoever sees in his dream that he is demolishing a new house, this indicates that tension and sadness will come. And whoever sees in his dream that he has built a new house, this heralds goodness for him. Whoever sees that He demolished the wall of a house and threw it to the ground. He sent a man from his family, and the wall shows a man in debt and capable of wealth. Whoever sees in his dream that the wall of the wall has fallen on him, this indicates his many sins, and his punishment will be hastened. And whoever sees in his dream that he enters his house and closes the doors On himself, this indicates that he keeps away from disobeying God. Whoever thinks that closing the doors of his house while he is happy shows goodness and prosperity. Whoever sees in his dream that his house is made of gold, this is evidence of a fire burning in his house. And whoever sees that he is leaving his house enters with anxiety and sadness. He sees in his dream that the area of ​​his house is larger than his original house. This is a sign of great goodness, God willing. Some commentators mentioned that seeing a house in a dream generally relates to the owner of the house and his family. Other interpretations of a house falling in a dream. Seeing a house falling in a dream usually means lack of good meanings and the appearance of misfortunes. And destruction for the owners of the house, and whoever dreams in a dream that his house is collapsing and falling due to the appearance of strong winds. These visions are not good
